name.description: The name of the ad group.

status.description: The current status of the ad group.

budget_in_micro_currency.description: The budget amount in micro currency for the ad group.

bid_in_micro_currency.description: The bid amount in micro currency for the ad group.

budget_type.description: The type of budget set for the ad group.

start_time.description: The start time for the ad group to begin running.

end_time.description: The end time for the ad group to run.

targeting_spec.description: The targeting specifications for the ad group.

lifetime_frequency_cap.description: The maximum number of times a user can be shown the ad during its lifetime.

tracking_urls.description: URLs for tracking different types of events for the ad group.

items.description: Description of buyable button tracking item.
Description of audience verification tracking item.

auto_targeting_enabled.description: Indicates if auto targeting is enabled for the ad group.

placement_group.description: The group of placements where the ad group is shown.

placement_traffic_type.description: The type of traffic the ad group targets.

pacing_delivery_type.description: The delivery type pacing for the ad group.

conversion_learning_mode_type.description: The learning mode type for conversion optimization.

summary_status.description: A summary status of the ad group.

feed_profile_id.description: The ID of the feed profile associated with the ad group.

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign to which the ad group belongs.

billable_event.description: The event for which the ad group is billed.

id.description: The unique identifier for the ad group.

type.description: The type of the ad group.

ad_account_id.description: The ID of the ad account associated with the ad group.

created_time.description: The timestamp when the ad group was created.

updated_time.description: The timestamp when the ad group was last updated.

optimization_goal_metadata.description: Metadata related to optimization goals for the ad group.

conversion_tag_v3_goal_metadata.description: Metadata specific to conversion optimization goals.

attribution_windows.description: Different attribution windows for conversion events.

click_window_days.description: Number of days for click attribution window.

engagement_window_days.description: Number of days for engagement attribution window.

view_window_days.description: Number of days for view attribution window.

conversion_event.description: The conversion event being optimized for.

conversion_tag_id.description: The ID of the conversion tag used for optimization.

cpa_goal_value_in_micro_currency.description: The cost per action goal in micro currency.

is_roas_optimized.description: Indicates if return on ad spend (ROAS) is optimized for.

learning_mode_type.description: The learning mode type for conversion optimization.

frequency_goal_metadata.description: Metadata related to frequency optimization goals.

frequency.description: The desired frequency of ad views.

timerange.description: The time range considered for frequency capping.

scrollup_goal_metadata.description: Metadata related to scroll-up optimization goals.

scrollup_goal_value_in_micro_currency.description: The scroll-up goal value in micro currency.

bid_strategy_type.description: The type of bid strategy used for the ad group.
